parameters.name: DatasetMaxBindCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of bindings per dataset. The value range is from 1 to 10.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxEntityCount
parameters.description:
The maximum number of metadata entities (including data files, file relationships, clustering groups, etc.) per dataset, with a maximum value of 2^63-1.
>Reserved parameter, no actual restriction in use.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxFileCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of files per dataset. The value range is from 1 to 100000000.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxRelationCount
parameters.description:
The maximum number of metadata relationships per dataset, with a maximum value of 2^63-1.
>Reserved parameter, no actual restriction in use.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxTotalFileSize
parameters.description: The maximum total size of files in each dataset. Once the limit is exceeded, no more indexes can be added. The maximum value is 2^63-1, measured in bytes.

parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: Dataset name, for how to obtain it, please refer to [Create Dataset](~~478160~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: Project name, for how to obtain it, please refer to [Create Project](~~478153~~).

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: Workflow template ID. For more information, please refer to [Workflow Templates and Operators](~~466304~~).
